message: Take it or leave it, Bob. You know I'm the one with the brains here, so don't even think about rejecting this generous offer.
Let's split it down the middle, no need for games.
Okay, Bob, you want to play hardball? Fine. I'm giving you a little more this time, but if you reject this, you're going to regret it.  Remember, the next round the inflation hits you even harder.
You're not getting any more generous, are you? I'll take what I can get.
